active_incidents.title: Degraded performance for less than 0.2% of users

notes.body: We believe service should be restored now and previously impacted users should no longer be experiencing issues with Slack. We're continuing the investigation and working to put together a permanent fix. We'll follow up when that's in place.

We're currently investigating an issue where less than 0.2% of customers may have difficulty loading Slack, or experiencing degraded performance. We apologize for the trouble, and will let you know when we're out of the woods.
